name: What Color?
description:
Just a simple arcade game based around idea of messing with names of colors and colors in three modes: For Children (and Colorblind), What Color? and Time Attack.

Leaderboards are available in Google Play version. Current best score in Time Attack is almost 22k points so feel free to beat it.

I am one man army so if you like the game feel free to share and press donate button.
